From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He arrived at the battle, transforming, to bot mode. He saw the ruins of
Feline. He walked over, and slumped to the ground. He was frantic, he
was crying coolent liquid.
"Feline? Feline?! FELINE!!!!!!!!!!!" Every shred of his tough guy
persona vanished. He was showing nothing but sarrow.
"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!! Matrix no! Take me, please!
Dont take her. I need her. Oh Vector Sigma, no! Please no."
He held what was left of her close, as he neeled on the ground, crying.
As war waged around him, he sat, holding the remains of his love.
"Please Feline, dont leave me." He wispers to the heavens.

::DrillBit::

He continued to guard the meeting room. His mind had woundered. He
didn't know if anyone had gotton past him.

::Demolition::

He saw the ordeal with Feline and Hot Rod. He didn't know those bots,
but he felt for Hot Rod.
